sentences.english: I'm always upset when I don't get mail.
sentences.chinese: 我接不到晌何邮件时总嗜心烦意乱。

sentences.english: Whether TTV is a hepatitis viral remains further study.
sentences.chinese: TTV是否嗜肝病毒，有待进一步研究。

sentences.english: Objective To improve the understanding of the radioactive charcteristics of vertebral eosinophilic granuloma.
sentences.chinese: 目的为了提高对脊椎骨嗜酸性肉芽肿的认识。

sentences.english: Gorged with power, I grew blind to Pokemon being alive.
sentences.chinese: 因贪嗜权力，竟令小生对神奇宝贝之存活盲目不见。

sentences.english: The job attributed to basophils that has spurred the most discussion is presenting antigens.
sentences.chinese: 嗜碱性细胞抗原呈递的新功能激起了最为热烈的讨论。

sentences.english: Lactobacillus acidophilus, or acidophilus for short, is one of the most useful organisms in your body.
sentences.chinese: 嗜酸乳杆菌，嗜酸或短，是最有益的生物在你的身体。

sentences.english: Dilate of shallow-layer blood capillary congests , see ooze blood and cell of neutral of be addicted to occasionally.
sentences.chinese: 浅层毛细血管扩张充血，偶见渗血及嗜中性细胞。

sentences.english: Don't fight not gentleness don't eosinophilic alcohol and tobacco, single good woman alone.
sentences.chinese: 不倾城不温柔不嗜烟酒，单身只身好女人。

sentences.english: It is a self-limited disease and has a benign prognosis.
sentences.chinese: 嗜伊红性腹膜炎为一自限性疾病且预后良好。

sentences.english: It is suggested that the key ingredient is thermolysin.
sentences.chinese: 成功分离的关键成份是嗜热菌蛋白酶。

sentences.english: Dr. Townsend was a drug addict.
sentences.chinese: 汤森特医生是个嗜药成癖的瘾君子。

sentences.english: Eosinophils can increase with allergic reactions and with parasitic infestations.
sentences.chinese: 当过敏反应和寄生虫感染时嗜酸性粒细胞会增多。

sentences.english: The religion of the Aztec was a bloodthirsty one.
sentences.chinese: 阿兹台克人的宗教信仰是一种嗜杀的宗教。

sentences.english: My opinion on that is that both food addiction and sex addiction are very real.
sentences.chinese: 我的看法是，嗜食症或性瘾癖是相当真实的。

sentences.english: The eosinophil increase can always be found out via routine blood inspections.
sentences.chinese: 血常规查抄常有嗜酸性粒细胞增多。

sentences.english: Leydig cells existed individually or in clusters, and their cytoplasm was abundant and eosinophilic.
sentences.chinese: 莱迪细胞呈单个或簇集存在，细胞浆丰富且嗜酸。
